General.Name: Scientech Corp
General.Description: Scientech Corporation engages in the research and development, production, sale, and maintenance of process equipment for semiconductors, liquid crystal displays (LCDs), light-emitting diodes (LEDs), and solar power generation industries. The company offers chemical analysis and biotechnology equipment; remote control system; camera lens; flat panel display; mask/reticle and semiconductor front-end process equipment; MEMS/compound semiconductor/LED products; semiconductor packaging and testing equipment; 3D printing equipment; and wet benches/single wafer wet process equipment, and temporary bonding/de-bonding/glass recycle tools. It also provides wafer reclaiming services; overhaul, repair, and calibration services; and used tools, such as refurbished metrology, Nikon stepper/scanner, TEL track, and ion implanter tools. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
